synopsis.text:
Sea of mysteries and waddling wonders, Penguin Highway follows the adventures of Aoyama, a precocious fourth-grader with an insatiable curiosity and a head full of knowledge. Living in a quiet suburban town, Aoyama's life takes a turn for the extraordinary when he encounters a colony of penguins, far from their natural habitat.

Determined to unravel this enigma, Aoyama teams up with his dental clinic crush, a charming woman he affectionately calls 'Onee-san'. Their investigation leads them to a mysterious levitating sphere they dub 'The Sea', which seems to be connected to the sudden appearance of the penguins.

As they delve deeper into the mystery, Aoyama and Onee-san discover that the penguins hold a strange power over 'The Sea'. But the truth behind this phenomenon is more unsettling than they could have ever imagined.

With just a few thousand days left until adulthood, Aoyama finds himself navigating a world of inexplicable wonders, challenging his scientific mind and testing the limits of his childhood innocence. Will Aoyama and Onee-san solve the mystery of the penguins and 'The Sea'? Join them on their thrilling journey and find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
